title: Bug 31627 - DBCS: Core Dump When Changing Perspective After Adding DBCS Project
description:
Language: Japanese
Build driver: eclipse SDK I20030211 linux gtk
OS: RedHat8 (Japanese locale jaJP.eucJP), gtk 2.2
JDK Ver.: IBM JDK1.3.1 + SR3
Summary: DBCS: Perspective change caused core dump after adding DBCS project to the workspace.

Description: The bug report lacks details on the expected behavior, observed behavior, and steps to reproduce the problem.
OB: After adding a DBCS project to the workspace, changing the perspective results in a core dump.
EB: The perspective change should not cause a core dump. The software should handle the addition of a DBCS project and perspective change without crashing.
SR:
1. Launch Eclipse with the specified build driver and configuration.
2. Add a DBCS project to the workspace.
3. Attempt to change the perspective.
4. Observe the core dump that occurs.
